content: the free download from yarnspirations is in **english** only in english and french on the yarn wrapper featuring the daisy wheel dishcloth on the wrapper lavette marguerite brighten-up your kitchen with this easily crocheted dishcloth featuring delicate petal edges bernat handicrafter cotton and your creativity get this one underway in so many color combinations so choose the 2 tones that tell your personal story with an absorbent cotton finish it s more than just a pretty piece *a daisy-inspired shape and bright bright stripes in this whimsical dishcloth yarnspirations * skill level easy the pattern was also published by lily but only the bernat version is currently available on the website
